bio.summary: I like getting involved in improving user experience & building better user interfaces on the web. I do frequently contribute to stackoverflow community & occasionally contribute to open source.

work.summary: Aplopio is a technology company focused on solving problems in hiring.
highlights: Working primarily on BackboneJS, developing reusable user interface components and gets involved in UX design.

work.summary: Navyug Info Solutions help you convert your business idea into reality.
highlights: Worked as a full stack Web Developer primarily across the technologies EmberJS, Ruby Rack Server, Ruby Datamapper, Grape API.

Developed & Designed a platform independent Desktop Application 'iQ4U'(I Query For You), using Java Swing and SQL, which aids Informatica developers in displaying the dependencies of objects such as Mappings, Sessions, Workflows etc.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology & Sciences, Pilani, Hyderabad
